attributes.action: We demand the resignation of Oliver Letwin.
attributes.additional_details:
For an explanation of what Mr Letwin has said please read the below article.
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-35192265
attributes.background: Oliver Letwin has previously attempted to influence government policy based on racist views he personally holds. As such he should not be allowed to influence policy. Bigotry has no place in government.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
